        public void downloadLastNotification()
                              throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                     java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                     javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     java.net.SocketException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     java.sql.SQLException,
                                     DatabaseTypeException,
                                     javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                     javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Download notification that sent while PushClient is offline
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type not supported
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if cipher text not multiply of 16 character
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm not found
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if invalid key
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if cipher text not multiply of 16 character
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if cipher text not multiply of 16 character
        java.net.SocketException - if any socket errors
